Detailed Description

GLIB replacement for libhal, the extra stuff.

Author:
Richard Hughes <richard@hughsie.com>
Date:
2005-10-02
This module is a direct replacement for libhal, and allows the user to query and set keys in a more glib way than using libhal.

Definition in file glibhal-main.c.
